title: Does ATMC plan to offer better cell phone coverage to the rural areas of Columbus County since they recently installed fiber optic lines for cable and internet?  (In particular the areas of Nakina, Old Dock and Highway 905 to the state line where coverage is poor or not available)
text:
Unfortunately, your question doesn't meet our criteria and won't be
answered. We focus our resources on Brunswick, New Hanover and Pender
counties.
